title: Add simplified link in bio feature for songs with admin approval

requirements.text: Create public song pages at `/song/[song-id]` that display song artwork, title, artist name with verification badge, and streaming platform links

quotes: Public song pages at `/song/[song-id]` with artwork, title, and artist info

acceptanceCriteria: Public route `/song/[song-id]` is accessible without authentication
Page displays song artwork from the song's existing artwork file
Page displays song title and artist name
Artist name includes verification badge using existing ArtistNameWithVerified component pattern
Page shows streaming platform links only for platforms that have URLs configured

requirements.text: Add streaming platform link fields to song data model for Spotify and Apple Music URLs

quotes: Streaming platform links for Spotify and Apple Music

acceptanceCriteria: Song data model includes optional fields for Spotify URL and Apple Music URL
URLs are stored as Text type
Existing songs are compatible with the new fields (migration if needed)

requirements.text: Add 'Manage Links' button to admin song list that opens a dialog for adding/editing streaming platform URLs for individual songs

quotes: Option A: 'Manage Links' button on song list
Admin dashboard with a 'Manage Links' button on the song list to add/edit streaming URLs

acceptanceCriteria: Each song row in AdminSubmissionsList has a 'Manage Links' button
Button opens a dialog with form fields for Spotify URL and Apple Music URL
Form pre-populates with existing URLs if available
Form validates that URLs start with http:// or https:// using existing isValidUrl utility
Save button updates the song's streaming platform URLs
Dialog matches existing admin dialog patterns (AdminEditSubmissionDialog style)

requirements.text: Display streaming platform links as styled buttons with platform logos and brand colors on public song pages

quotes: yes it should have specific styling (like platform logos, colors, etc.)
Streaming platform links for Spotify and Apple Music with platform logos and colors

acceptanceCriteria: Spotify button uses Spotify green brand color (#1DB954)
Apple Music button uses Apple Music red/pink brand color
Each button displays the platform's logo icon
Buttons are visually distinct and properly sized for touch/click
Only platforms with configured URLs are displayed
Buttons link to the configured streaming platform URLs

requirements.text: Public song pages are only accessible after admin approval - songs with status other than 'live' return 404 or access denied

quotes: pages only go live after admin approval

acceptanceCriteria: Public song page endpoint checks song status before returning data
Only songs with 'live' status are accessible on public pages
Songs with 'draft', 'pending', 'rejected', or other non-live statuses return appropriate error response
Error handling prevents unauthorized access to non-approved content

requirements.text: Render generated platform logo images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Platform logo images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are referenced with correct paths in streaming platform buttons
Fallback handling if logo images are not found

constraints: Use existing ArtistNameWithVerified component for displaying artist names with verification badges
Follow existing admin dialog patterns from AdminEditSubmissionDialog and AdminEditVideoDialog
Use existing isValidUrl utility for URL validation
Maintain single-actor architecture with all backend logic in main.mo
Start with only Spotify and Apple Music - do not add other platforms yet
nonGoals: Podcast pages with streaming links (future iteration)
Additional streaming platforms beyond Spotify and Apple Music
Separate 'Add Streaming Links' workflow after song creation (using simplified inline approach)
YouTube Music, SoundCloud, or Amazon Music integration
Analytics or tracking for link clicks
Custom URL slugs or vanity URLs

required: Spotify logo icon on white background, circular or square format suitable for button display (spotify-logo.dim_128x128.png)
Apple Music logo icon on white background, circular or square format suitable for button display (apple-music-logo.dim_128x128.png)
